ProjectTitle: A novel combinatory approach for stress regulation in autism: Evaluating the neuro-behavioral effects of chronic oxytocin within a tailored mindfulness-based program
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/02/2025
Sharing: privacy is likely a factor restricting the sharing of (some of) your data. Please ensure that your data is fully anonymized before sharing it as open data. If the data is pseudonymous, meaning there is still a (small) possibility that participants could be reidentified by you or by others, you can use RDR and apply access restrictions. Interested researchers will be able to view the description of your dataset but must submit a request to access the files. Access can than be granted upon signing a Data Transfer Agreement. For more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
